Dim rege As Variant
Set rege = CreateObject("Wscript.shell")
rege.RegWrite "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Patchou\asd", &H20000170, "REG_BINARY"


Togli bandierina finestre
explorer
0C00000040000000 740000001A000000 1300000033000000 050000006A000000 2600000001000000 E1000000DF010000 0400000001000000 BD00000002000000 200000008D010000 0300000009000000 B8000000
shell browser
0C0000004C000000 740000001A000000 1000000017000000 050000006A000000 2600000001000000 E000000056000000 0200000029000000 5700000003000000 A800000000000000 0400000009000000 55010000

Dim rege As Variant
Set rege = CreateObject("Wscript.shell")
rege.RegWrite "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Internet Explorer\Toolbar\ShellBrowser\ITBarLayout", &H0C00000040000000740000001A0000001300000033000000050000006A0000002600000001000000E1000000DF0100000400000001000000BD00000002000000200000008D0100000300000009000000B8000000, "REG_BINARY"

Dim rege As Variant
Set rege = CreateObject("Wscript.shell")
rege.RegWrite "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Internet Explorer\Toolbar\Explorer\ITBarLayout", &H0C00000040000000740000001A0000001300000033000000050000006A0000002600000001000000E1000000DF0100000400000001000000BD00000002000000200000008D0100000300000009000000B8000000, "REG_BINARY"
